subtitle: Defined boundaries and non-negotiable requirements that shape the system design.

data.title: Target Users
data.description: The system serves two primary user groups: customers who browse and purchase books, and administrators who manage products, inventory, and orders.

data.title: Scalable Architecture
data.description: The system must support future growth in traffic, product catalog size, and order volume without requiring major architectural changes.

data.title: Stock Consistency
data.description: Inventory levels must remain consistent across concurrent operations to prevent overselling and ensure reliable order fulfillment.

data.title: Role-Based Authentication
data.description: Authentication and authorization must be role-based, ensuring that customers and administrators have clearly separated access and permissions.

data.title: Payment Gateway
data.description: The system integrates with Midtrans to handle online payments securely and reliably, following standard payment flow best practices.
